headline: Clorox Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend of $1.24 Per Share
summary: The Clorox Company (NYSE: CLX) announced today that its board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.24 per share on the company's common stock. The dividend is payable November 6, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on October 22, 2025.
